name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 9, Jiangsu. Two examinees rushed out of the examination room and displayed the Palestinian flag, but the police took the flag away and took them away from the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 9, the Palestinian flag appeared at the Xianyang Daqin Youth Music Festival and was later confiscated by security guards.
In the early morning of the 10th, the organizer issued a notice saying that they had been severely reprimanded by the higher authorities and that the relevant departments required that no flags be carried tomorrow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 9, Hunan University.
A foreign man put a Palestinian flag on the back seat of his car and rode around Hunan University

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the original photographer is asking students to delete the photo and said "the matter is very serious", "many people are dealing with these things", "very serious issues are involved"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 8, netizens saw an exhibit at the China Aviation Museum: Resolutely Defend Chairman Xi

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 9, a document from Ganzhou Aikang Photovoltaic Technology Co., Ltd. circulated online stated that due to the current overcapacity in the entire photovoltaic industry, the company decided to suspend operations. The second month of suspension of work will be paid at 70% of the minimum wage standard, and employees will need to bear all expenses such as dormitory water, electricity and gas.
As early as the beginning of this year, many photovoltaic companies had reported layoffs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 10, it was reported online that four foreigners were attacked and stabbed in Beishan Park, Jilin City.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Party Committee meeting of the Ministry of Public Security was held in Beijing on the 5th. The meeting emphasized: Cooperate in risk prevention and control and mitigation work in key areas such as real estate, and strictly prevent systemic risks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 10, Xi'an, Shaanxi. A SF Express rider reported that the team leader often extorted money from the riders. If they resisted, the team leader would not only insult the riders, but also privately reassign the riders' orders through the backstage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 9 (Released), Qinhuangdao, Hebei. An online car-hailing driver beat law enforcement officers with a stick.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Since June, many netizens have discovered that the domestic input method cannot display the Palestinian flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the other hand, peripherals containing Palestinian elements are hot sellers on Chinese e-commerce platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many netizens have reported that some uncopyrighted animations and works that violate the domestic censorship mechanism have begun to appear in large numbers on Bilibili.
Netizens said this may be related to the recent large-scale layoffs of Bilibili's review posts.
